byline.contributor: Noah Remnick and Rick Rojas contributed reporting, and Susan C. Beachy contributed research.
byline.original: By J. DAVID GOODMAN and AL BAKER

abstract: Friends, family, colleagues and neighbors of detective Joseph Lemm of New York City Police Dept mourn news of his death; Lemm was killed in suicide bombing along with five other American in Afghanistan; there are about 130 officers from department serving in different branches of military.
lead_paragraph: The death of Joseph Lemm, who died in a suicide bombing along with five other Americans, was felt throughout the Police Department as well as in his Nebraska hometown.

headline.main: New York Detective Killed in Afghanistan Is Mourned as an ‘Unassuming Hero’
headline.print_headline: 2 Communities Unite in Grief for an ‘Unassuming Hero’

snippet: The death of Joseph Lemm, who died in a suicide bombing along with five other Americans, was felt throughout the Police Department as well as in his Nebraska hometown.
